label: CentOS-based 7.3 SRIOV
summary: This distribution of Linux is based on CentOS and is provided by Rogue Wave Software.
description: This distribution of Linux Accelerated Networking is based on CentOS version 7.3 and is provided by Rogue Wave Software (formerly OpenLogic). It contains an installation of the Basic Server packages and is intended for users who need to create an Azure Virtual Machine (VM) with Accelerated Networking.  More Information can be found https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-network/virtual-network-create-vm-accelerated-networking and https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/updates/accelerated-networking-in-preview/
